alert.note: Alert for Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 5:25PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Kiowa and north central Bent Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 524 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles northeast of Arlington to near Haswell to Blue Lake. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Kiowa and north central Bent Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
